name: Colorblock Tank Dress
description: This sleeveless tank dress features a colorblock design in black and beige. It has a scoop neckline and a relaxed, straight fit. Made from a soft and comfortable knit fabric, this dress is perfect for everyday wear.

name: Sleeveless A-Line Dress
description: This sleeveless A-line dress features a scoop neck, a fitted bodice, and a flowy skirt that falls to the knee. It is made from a soft, comfortable fabric that drapes beautifully. This dress is perfect for a variety of occasions, from casual outings to formal events.

name: Sleeveless Button-Up Blouse
description: This sleeveless blouse features a classic button-up design, a collared neckline, and a slightly cropped hem. Made from a lightweight, flowy fabric, it's perfect for layering or wearing on its own.

name: Warehouse Open Front Blazer
description: This blush pink open front blazer is perfect for adding a touch of sophistication to any outfit. It features a relaxed fit and long sleeves, making it a versatile piece that can be dressed up or down. The blazer is made from a lightweight fabric that is perfect for layering in the spring and summer months.

name: Striped Crop Top
description: This is a red and white striped crop top with a square neckline and thin straps. It is made from a soft, stretchy fabric and has a relaxed fit.

name: SoulCal & Co. V-Neck Sweater
description: This gray SoulCal & Co. sweater is a classic piece that is perfect for any occasion. Made from soft and comfortable knit, it features a v-neckline, long sleeves, and a white stripe detail on the sleeves and hem. This sweater is perfect for layering or wearing on its own.

name: Geometric Print Tank Top
description: This tank top features a white base with black and grey geometric print. It has a loose fit and a slightly cropped length. It is perfect for casual summer days.

name: Dolce & Gabbana Silk Blouse
description: This classic white silk blouse features a black bow tie and ruffle detailing at the cuffs. It is perfect for a formal occasion or a night out.
